thread.title: Kobe Steel CEO resigns over data fraud scandal

title: Kobe Steel CEO resigns over data fraud scandal
text:
Kobe Steel CEO resigns over data fraud scandal 6:03pm IST - 01:42 
Kobe Steel admitted its data fraud has been going on nearly five decades and also revealed new cases of cheating, highlighting the challenges facing the 112-year-old company mired in compliance failures and malfeasance. Ryan Brooks reports.
